synopsis.text: Kogorou Akechi, an enigmatic detective, leads the Boy Detectives Club in the 2030s, solving mysteries of all magnitudes with their distinctive abilities. One day, club member Kensuke Hanazaki encounters Yoshio Kobayashi, a peculiar boy who, due to the 'Unidentifiable Mist,' is trapped in an immortal body but craves death. Intrigued by Kobayashi, Hanazaki extends an invitation to join the club. As they work together, their paths intertwine with the era's most notorious villain, the Fiend With Twenty Faces, and the mysterious detective Akechi. Brace yourself for a thrilling ride as the Boy Detectives Club unravels the intricate web of fate that binds them together.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
